Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The presence of dracoloths in the Plaza of the Fallen tips the scales of power against the federation.

Hunt down the {@LinkCreature:55#22#malbinar dracoloths}.

Report to Jola at Valumnir Outpost when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
